tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE yields (
    yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    farmer_id INT NOT NULL,
    yield_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    yield_year INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE crop_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE,
    yield FLOAT
);
